metadata.title: G103-3 Menuetto
metadata.description:
Luigi Boccherini - Six String Trios, Op 34, G 101 - G 106, 1781
{Trio, Op 34 #3, G 103} III) Menuetto
Disc 2, Track 3
Source: Chamber Music of Boccherini, Volumes 1-3 (Vinyl LPs) Label: Westminster Collectors Series (ABC-Paramount Records) Catalog Numbers: W-9012 (18050), W-9013 (18051), and W-9014 (18052) Performers: Walter Schneiderhan, violin ; Gustav Swoboda, violin ; Senta Benesch, cello Recorded: 1955
Digitized: 2008 Liner Notes: http://operaerobic.blogspot.com/2010/04/boccherini-op34.html Archival Reference: http://www.clir.org/PUBS/abstract/pub135abst.html
metadata.subject: chamber music
